summary: This bill, the Charting My Path for Future Success Act, directs the Secretary of Education to reissue the solicitation and award a contract for the "Charting My Path for Future Success" project. This project supports high school students with disabilities by training educators to help them set goals, develop action plans, and track progress. The bill also prohibits cancellation of the awarded contract without Congressional approval. The project aims to benefit students by assisting them in building skills to be successful in school and career paths.
